Flow.description: Various stages of procurement opps and their related processes
Flow.label: Procurement Opp Processes

value.stringValue: Coordinate Inspection; update inspection section including inspection status on Opp.
Log into Walker's SF account and send matching email on this unit.
Use TopBid to confirm year of unit; @post on the opportunity and in unit confidential notes put "year xxxx confirmed via TopBid"
If not already there, add Specalog PDF for this unit to the "Specalog Link" field on the equipment page.
Obtain Unit Details, unit address, and site contact; have VAs create Contact Record for site contact; update Site Contact and address info on unit page.
Determine if/when the machine needs to moved, or how long it can be stored at current location. If needing moved, update unit page accordingly.
Update sell pricing based on final purchase price
Send matching email; ensure unit details are complete and pics are decent

Inspection is being schedule. 1) Speak with the inspector; 2) ensure they get appropriate pics/vids; 3) get a build sheet/service history (if dealer); and 4) ensure completed inspection report and ECU (Matris/etc.) are completed.
Add inspection report to Google Drive and create link on Unit Page field called "Inspection Report - Google Drive Link"

recordCreates.name: myRule_28_A1
recordCreates.label: Ensure inspection report is good to go

value.stringValue: Ensure Inspection is added to unit page and is complete

Get seller invoice with "free and clear of liens/encumbrances" verbiage and wire info. Confirm wire info by phone and add to BOS. Incl year, make, model, S/N and ZID in the payment details of wire. @Post Hardy when completed.
Check with LO to ensure that invoice and wire instructions are accurate. Approve the wire for the purchase of this unit and @ Post Collin when completed.
Change unit inventory status to owned; change Account Purchased From to the current account; change current account to Zadoon, LLC; update Zadoon's final purchase price to purchase amount (see wire)

DO NOT DO if Dealer unit; check opp to see if UNADVERTISED, ADVERTISED, or NO MC email to be sent. Send MC to end users + equipment sellers (if end user unit). Exclude all contacts from selling company.
Update sell pricing based on seller's most recent bottom price, make it extra competitive.
Send matching email. This unit is in proactive brokerage; keep an eye out for Mailchimp responses.
Follow up on this proactive brokerage opp - any hits/offers? did seller sell it?
Check Proactive Brokerage Options section of Opp to see if it should be marketed on MT.
[Sandip] Check Proactive Brokerage Options on Procurement Opp to see if this should be marketed on CL
ID calls for most recent (minimum 5) End User IDs
[Sandip] Create MC List and put on MC call spreadsheet; also attach to tasks for MC Calls for Brandi/Claudia
2 days after MC email, attach MC list link to unit page; create task off PO for Brandi to call top 10 end users and attach link to MC list to task.

recordCreates.name: myRule_38_A8
recordCreates.label: Post on FB groups via Machinio

value.stringValue: Post this unit on FB groups (at least 20)
Ensure Unit Details are completed and ask for additional pictures if there are not many
Follow up with seller to see if there has been progress.
Set competitive sell pricing based on comparable MT units.
Unlist unit from all forms of marketing.
